title: May's Big Feelings
backCoverBlurb: May has big emotions! Sometimes he's happy, sometimes he's sad, and sometimes he's safe with Mommy. Join May as he learns to understand his feelings.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He has an expressive face. He is wearing a blue and white striped shirt.

pages.text: May felt very happy today. He had a big, wide smile. Can you show me a happy face?
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting on a colorful rug, looking at the camera with a huge, joyful smile.

pages.text: Being happy feels like a warm sun inside his belly. Yay! he cried as he danced.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is jumping and dancing in a bright, sunny room with a very happy expression.

pages.text: But sometimes, May feels a little bit sad. Pout! His mouth went down. Poor May.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May has a small pout on his face and is looking down at his feet with a soft, sad expression.

pages.text: Mommy gave him a big, sweet hug. A hug feels like a soft, cozy cloud. Sniff, sniff.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is being hugged by his mommy, resting his head on her shoulder and looking comforted.

pages.text: One morning, May felt a little bit angry. Grrr! He stomped his feet once.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May has a small scowl on his face and is stomping his foot on the floor, looking determined but safe.

pages.text: He took a long, deep breath. One... two... three. Now May felt calm and quiet.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is sitting with his eyes closed, taking a slow breath. He looks very peaceful and relaxed.

pages.text: May also felt very surprised. Oh! His eyes went wide and his mouth was an 'O'.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking at a new toy with wide, sorprendido eyes and his mouth open in an 'O' shape.

pages.text: All feelings are okay! thought little May. How do you feel right now? Point to your heart.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is looking at the camera and pointing his finger at his chest with a gentle, wise smile.

pages.text: May is learning that big feelings can come and go like the wind. Whoosh!
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing outside with his arms open as the wind blows through his curly hair.

pages.text: He feels brave when he tries something new. You are strong, May! said Mommy.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is standing tall and looking empowered as he tries to climb a small step.

pages.text: Now May feels very sleepy and content. It was a day full of many feelings.
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. May is rubbing his eye with one hand and looks very ready for a rest in the soft light.

pages.text: Goodnight, May. Sleep with a happy and calm heart. You are so loved! Shhh...
pages.imagePrompt: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. A peaceful close-up of May sleeping soundly with a slight, happy smile on his face.
